title: Most popular leisure activities among adults in the U.S. 2013
summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 42.0 is found at Response Watch TV and the minimum is found at Gardening where Response is 7.0.
There is a difference of 35.0 between the maximum Response Watch TV and minimum Response Gardening.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 10 number of Responses.
Response Watch TV has the highest Share of respondents and Gardening has the lowest Share of respondents.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 42.0 is found at Response Watch TV and the minimum is found at Gardening where Response is 7.0.
There is a difference of 35.0 between the maximum Response Watch TV and minimum Response Gardening.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 42.0 is found at Response Watch TV and the minimum is found at Gardening where Response is 7.0.
Second maximum Share of respondents is found at Response Reading.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 35.0.
The Response Watch TV has the highest Share of respondents, followed by Reading, and Computer/internet. Down to the Response Gardening which is the lowest.
Response Exercise/working out, and Playing video games and computer/internet games have a similar Share of respondents that is 10.0.
The highest value 42.0 at Watch TV is almost 2.49 times larger than the average value 16.9.
Summing up the values of all Responses, we get total 169.0.

data.Response: Spending time with family and friends
Playing video games and computer/internet games
